# style

**Instance Property**

The semantic style the format style uses to represent a byte count value.

## Declaration

```swift
var style: ByteCountFormatStyle.Style { get set }
```

## Customizing style behavior

- **ByteCountFormatStyle.Style**: The semantic style to use when formatting a byte count value.
